meanings.definition: Refuse to take notice of or acknowledge; disregard intentionally.
meanings.sent1: She chose to ignore the loud noise outside.
meanings.sent2: It is not polite to ignore someone when they are speaking to you.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to ignore the mouse, pretending not to see it.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the warning signs could lead to dangerous consequences.
meanings.sent5: If you ignore your responsibilities, they will only pile up.

meanings.definition: Fail to consider or deal with; disregard.
meanings.sent1: He tends to ignore his homework until the last minute.
meanings.sent2: Ignoring a problem will not make it go away.
meanings.sent3: The plant chose to ignore the lack of sunlight and kept growing.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the leak in the roof could result in water damage.
meanings.sent5: If you ignore your health, it may deteriorate over time.
